content: This PR #34402 constructs the GL2-invariant measure on the upper half-plane, an important technical ingredient in modular form theory. The PR – which was written by me and then substantially reworked by @Yury G. Kudryashov – has been idle for 3 weeks, other than merges for master updates. I would be grateful for a review of this PR, as it is somewhat blocking progress in modular form theory.
